data.description: Replace phrases via an external lookup table
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This package is modelled after the UserLand glossary system where
    words, or phrases, wrapped in double-quotes are compared against a
    lookup table and are replaced by their corresponding entries.

    Currently only one type of lookup table is supported : a
    well-formed XBEL bookmarks file. Support for other kinds of lookup
    tables may be added at a later date.

    BACKGROUND http://www.la-grange.net/2002/09/04.html

    http://aaronland.info/weblog/archive/4586

    SEE ALSO http://glossary.userland.com/

    http://pyxml.sourceforge.net/topics/xbel/
